Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant! H-E-L-L-O!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huh? Nanami... Why are you messaging me here...', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Is that strange, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Shouldn't you be at the Science Council right now?", 3: '10'}
{2: 'I thought they were interested in your device thingy...', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oh! So you sent me to the Science Council to wait for you on purpose, Commandant!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami just wanted you to try her "Full Sensory Simulation Device"... Luckily, I managed to escape from the Science Council! They would\'ve bothered Nanami to no end otherwise!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "By the way... this device is mighty impressive! It can connect all your senses, Commandant, creating a super-human's cognition!", 4: '1'}
{2: "It doesn't sound very safe...", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Relax! Worst comes to worst, you'll get knocked unconscious for half a day... Right, Nanami is almost at your location.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Really?! How unfortunate! I just happened to be somewhere else...', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Why am I hearing someone panting... Are you running, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haha, it was probably Kamui running past the door.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oh, is that so...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course! I should let him know not to run in the hallway.', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But I thought I saw someone like you running away, Commandant! I was too late, though...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huff... Puff... It must be... someone else.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're panting very heavily, Commandant... Are you okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I... probably was choking on water because I drank it too fast.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ah! I found you, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What... Impossible! Where are you?!', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Look behind you!', 4: '1'}
